mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.form_id AS "formId", a.form_name AS "formName", a.form_type AS "formType", a.form_url AS "formUrl", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.form_html AS "formHtml"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wy_biz_form( form_id, form_name, form_type, form_url, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, form_html ) VALUES ( #{formId}, #{formName}, #{formType}, #{formUrl}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{formHtml} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wy_biz_form SET form_id = #{formId}, form_name = #{formName}, form_type = #{formType}, form_url = #{formUrl}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, form_html = #{formHtml} WHERE id = #{id}
